Method Detail

getSaeFeature

public net.juniper.smgt.sae.sae.SAEFeature getSaeFeature(String ipAddress,
                                                         String featureName,
                                                         List vrName)
Return reference to a named feature of a service activation engine.

The locator uses the ipAddress of a user to locate first the Service Activation Engine that handles the session of this user and then the featureName to retrieve a reference to a remote object implementing the named Service Activation Engine feature.

Parameters:
ipAddress - The IP address of the user requesting access.
featureName - The name of the requested feature. The feature must be installed in the located service activation engine.
vrName - A List to be filled by this method with the name of the virtualRouter which this ipAddress maps to
Returns:
reference to the located feature or null if the feature could not be located.

setProperties

public void setProperties(Properties props)
                   throws ServletException
Configure the locator.

Parameters:
props - a Properties object containing configuration properties.
ServletException

invalidateSaeFeature

public void invalidateSaeFeature(String ipAddress)
Invalidate a feature

This method destroys any cached object references for the given ipAddress.

Parameters:
ipAddress - The IP address of the user requesting access.

destroy

public void destroy()
free all resources used by this locator.
